gen:link.msg:message: v7679_a: [Type of SRT (significant risk transfer)] facts must (if reported) be one of the items [Not applied for SRT and the firm risk weights its securitised exposures], [Achieved SRT under Articles 244 (2) (a) or 245 (2) (a) of CRR], [Achieved SRT under Articles 244 (2) (b) or 245 (2) (b) of CRR], [Achieved SRT under Articles 244 (3) (a) or 245 (3) (a) of CRR], [Applying a 1250% RW or deducting retained positions according to Articles 244 (1) (b) or 245 (1) (b) of CRR] --> [C 14.00] [ei750] ∈ {{[eba_RT:x14], [eba_RT:x15], [eba_RT:x16], [eba_RT:x17], [eba_RT:x18]}} FAILS because {$a} = (xs:QName('eba_RT:x14'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x15'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x16'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x17'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x18')) is not true

v7679_a: [C 14.00] [ei750] ∈ {{[eba_RT:x14], [eba_RT:x15], [eba_RT:x16], [eba_RT:x17], [eba_RT:x18]}} FAILS because {$a} = (xs:QName('eba_RT:x14'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x15'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x16'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x17'), xs:QName('eba_RT:x18')) is not true
